originalText.text: Dr. Yuan private practice has only been around half a year now and she continues to deliver quality service as one of NYC’s best rheumatologist. Service is quick, kind and responsive. The aesthetics of the office is calming and describes the type of type of treatment she provides.

text.text: Dr. Yuan private practice has only been around half a year now and she continues to deliver quality service as one of NYC’s best rheumatologist. Service is quick, kind and responsive. The aesthetics of the office is calming and describes the type of type of treatment she provides.

originalText.text: Dr. Yuan has been my doctor since  2009. She is the best. She is knowledgeable and an expert in her field. She very patient and listens to your concerns. I would not trade her for the world.

text.text: Dr. Yuan has been my doctor since  2009. She is the best. She is knowledgeable and an expert in her field. She very patient and listens to your concerns. I would not trade her for the world.

originalText.text:
Dr. Yuan is the first rheumatologist in 15 years to tell me that my diet and my mindset can impact my autoimmune diseases. She’s truly a life (and quality of life) saver.

I really like her new UES office. It’s near multiple subway lines, has a great patient portal, and has very responsive staff.

text.text:
Dr. Yuan is the first rheumatologist in 15 years to tell me that my diet and my mindset can impact my autoimmune diseases. She’s truly a life (and quality of life) saver.

I really like her new UES office. It’s near multiple subway lines, has a great patient portal, and has very responsive staff.

originalText.text: Dr. Yuan is by far the best of the best doctors I’ve ever met in my life. She is my mom’s doctor and she has a complicated case, because apart from RA she has crohn’s and medications for the RA contraindicate with the Crohn’s meds. But Dr. Yuan has gone above and beyond to help my mother, she’s a true expert. Not only is she professional, knowledgeable and thorough but she’s caring. She cares about her patients from the bottom of her heart and even while she was on vacation she would still message my mom to see how she’s doing. My mom’s RA is severe and she’s walking thanks to God and Dr. Yuan. Love her! Finding a loving and caring provider nowadays is very difficult. I recommend Dr. Yuan 1000000000000000%.!

text.text: Dr. Yuan is by far the best of the best doctors I’ve ever met in my life. My mom’s RA is severe and she’s walking thanks to God and Dr. Yuan. Love her! Finding a loving and caring provider nowadays is very difficult. I recommend Dr. Yuan 1000000000000000%.!

originalText.text: Dr. Yuan is by far the best doctor I've ever had, and this is not an exaggeration. After over three years of undiagnosed chronic pain seeing numerous doctors and even having surgery, I met Dr. Yuan who offered a diagnosis upon our first appointment. Since then, she has been caring, personable, attentive and responsive - not a small feat given the heavy workloads of doctors in NYC. I give Dr. Yuan my highest recommendation - my life would be quite different without her!
